meanings.definition: To ride a bicycle or snowboard without following a set course or trail.
meanings.sent1: I love to freeride down the mountain on my snowboard.
meanings.sent2: She decided to freeride through the forest instead of sticking to the main path.
meanings.sent3: The kids challenged each other to a freeride race down the hill.
meanings.sent4: After work, he likes to freeride his bike around the neighborhood to relax.
meanings.sent5: The daredevil freerided down the steep slope with ease and grace.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in freeriding.
meanings.sent1: The freeride was exhilarating as he zoomed down the slope.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the fastest freeride in the group.
meanings.sent3: The freeride always brings excitement and adventure to our outings.
meanings.sent4: As a freeride, he enjoys the thrill of exploring new paths on his snowboard.
meanings.sent5: The freeride's skills on the slopes are unmatched by anyone else.

meanings.definition: A style of skiing or snowboarding that involves riding off-piste terrain.
meanings.sent1: Freeride skiing requires skill and confidence on challenging slopes.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends decided to try freeride snowboarding for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The freeride competition showcased the athletes' daring moves on the mountain.
meanings.sent4: She felt a rush of adrenaline as she tackled the freeride course with finesse.
meanings.sent5: The freeride event drew a crowd of spectators eager to witness the action.
